result.execSummary:
The defendant Gregory J Schulze was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Alter Price (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Concurrent with: Concurrent with La Crosse Co case 21CF931, with conditions also concurrent
.

miscConds.notes:
Def to undergo Alcohol and Drug Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations. 
.

Def is not to consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances without a prescription from licensed physician, with random testing

No Contact with users or traffickers of illicit drugs or controlled substances
.

Complete any other assessments or evaluations as deemed appropriate by the PO and follow-through with any treatment recommended

Pay restitution and surcharge as shown in 21CF931

Pay mandatory Court costs/fees totalling $453 in this case

Pay DOC Supervision fees (not shown) - to be paid directly to the Dept of Corrections

JOC will be amended to reflect sentence credit when the DA's office turns that in

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of resititution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt 
.

timeConds.notes:
The def is to complete 30 hours Community Service work during period of supervision

Concurrent with 21CF931 (one-time only)
.
.
Concurrent with: To be completed during period of supervision - Concurrent with 21CF931(one-time only)
.
.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gregory J Schulze

records.addlTxt:
State by Sanford in person / Def w/ Atty Tom Locante in person
Statement of Negotiated Plea filed - signed by def / understands
Plea Quest & Waiver filed - signed by def / understands
Ct 1 - Def pleads GUILTY
Sanford: State is in compliance w/ victim rights act - rely on complaint for factual basis
Locante: no objection
CRT finds def's plea is FV&I made - factual basis exists to accept plea - finds def guilty
Ct 2 - Dismissed & read-in
CRT'S SENTENCE:  Sent w/held;  Probatin 1 yr Concurrent w/ 21CF931, w/ conditions also concurrent:  AODA & follow-thru w/ trmt recommended;  Def is not to consume or possess any alcohol or cont subs w/o valid prescription, w/ random testing;  No Contact w/ known users or traffickers of illicit drugs or cont subs;  Complete any other assessments or evaluations deemed approp by the PO and follow-thru w/ any treatment recommended;  Pay restitution and surcharge as shown in 21CF931;  Complete 30 hrs Community Service (on all cases concurrent - one time only);  Pay mandatory Crt cts/fees of $453;  Pay DOC fees (not shown) - to be paid directly to the Dept of Corrections;  JOC will be amended to reflect sentence credit when the DA's office turns that in
(Note:  Minutes were corrected to remove a condition re: Felony conviction as def was not convicted on a felony)
Case not called.  Continued to 10-24-22 at 11:30am with SLH

Def in custody w/Atty Locante
Prelim waiver filed - signed/understands. No promises/threats.
COURT finds the waiver of the PH is F & V made. Bound over.
Information filed - Reading waived.  Def Stands Mute - NG Pleas entered
PTC: 8/12 at 1:30 pm   STC:  9/7 at 10:00 am   SLH 
CRT: bond to be modified to $1000 sig bond to cover all files w/the same cond
Status conference on September 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
